name: Worldcore [OLD]
description: Worldcore Coin has been formulated with the aim to break the high entry barriers that discourage the common man from venturing into the investment sector. This is made possible by offering a versatile token that is underpinned by a large trading capital and expertise of seasoned financial experts. In return, the stakeholders will receive dividends directly into their wallets every month. As a payment option, the Worldcore Coin will help promote cryptocurrency adoption to settle everyday transactions. Individuals will benefit from the many advantages associated with the lucrative decentralized crypto ecosystem.
